messages.title: Why you should vote Liberal Democrats in Brecon and Radnorshire
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats can win here. The Labour Party can't win here. This is 1 of 50 seats where a Lib Dem vote on Thursday can stop the Tories.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats beat both Labour and the Conservatives at the European Elections back in May - and gained over 700 councillors at the local elections. They are winning elections up and down the country.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on tactical voting and the Liberal Democrats' ability to win in the constituency of Brecon and Radnorshire. Specific policies, candidate details, or further campaign information are not provided on the visible side of the leaflet.
